website_summaries.verdict: A powerful carpet washer that works well and is a contender for the best in spite of the bulky build.
pros: Offers the brand's patented spin scrub technology that removes deep-down dirt and stains

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: After 8 years of use, i had to replace my old Vax carpet cleaner... and what a great replacement it is!!! So much better built, easy to operate, easy to clean after use. Carpet looking like new after 1st deep clean, was completely dry in about 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: inna

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest I must say. On living room carpet it showed little to no improvement to the colour. After one use on the stairs with the hose fitting, the water stopped coming through the nozzle. Went through all the book and e mailed Vax (useless). Still no good so returned it next day. Pros It does clean through the main machine. Very heavy. Very loud Cons. Leaks water when stored even though all tanks emptied. Hose fitting packed up after one use. Power cord gets in the way and catches when in use. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vaxtastic
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was worried about the weight and assembly. But wasn’t to bad and was easy to put together. First use and I love it! I used it with a third party carpet cleaning fluid (bubblegum) and it has made my carpets look and smell amazing!! Highly recommend it. So easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Neenaw

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my daughter who moved into a large house with very dirty carpets which she was about to throw out but when she cleaned them with the vax cleaner and shampoo they came up like new and saved her a lot of money Would recommend Good price too
customer_reviews.author: Helen Ringrose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and cleans carpets and unholstery effectively
customer_reviews.text: I used the Vax for the pads on our dining chairs which were coated in play dough, food and paint. The photo shows the worst chair, before and after. Have also done all the stairs in our 4 storey house. I found the Vax easy to use although I was surprised at how little dirty water was in the tank at the end compared to all the clean water/shampoo I put into it! Really pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Pw Bamford

customer_reviews.title: Packed with power.
customer_reviews.text: My previous, more expensive Vax machine having finally died from long use, I bought this one as a replacement, and am delighted with it. It's physically smaller and lighter than my old model, but just as powerful, and more manoeuvrable into corners etc. Mine came as an Amazon Warehouse Deal at a considerable reduction, and I couldn't find any fault with it - the packaging was totally undamaged and the machine and accessories had obviously never been out of the box, fastened together with intact cable ties. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnychick

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Carpet Cleaner full stop.
customer_reviews.text: My initial purchase had a problem but was replaced within two days thanks to Vax and Amazon. The replacement machine hasn't missed a beat, and the transformation to the carpets is nothing less that amazing, so easy to use and to clean after you have finished. I would recommend this machine to anyone who is seriously considering buying a carpet shampooing machine. The Vax Platinum shampoo that is included with the machine is recommended without reservation, amazing cleaner. I would give this machine 6 stars if it were possible, a great product at a great price, well done Vax.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Collins

customer_reviews.title: Carpet washer
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t impressed with results it doesn’t suck the water up as I hoped the older model was a lot better
customer_reviews.author: Terry Angela jones

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy
customer_reviews.text: It does clean very well but at some point it started to leak and it's very hard to use it as it's heavy
customer_reviews.author: Ana-Maria

customer_reviews.title: absolutly briliant Carpet Washer
customer_reviews.text: we bought this ahead of getting a puppy as we expected accidents ! the suction on this is fantastic, carpets are dry within 30 mins and just damp to the touch straight after use. It also has a scrubber that works really well so if you have a stain or mark it will get it out, the hose attachment is great for the stairs and I have used it in the car with great results. we have had this a few months now and it's fantastic, my daughter used it on a " proficiently cleaned" all carpet that still had marks and dirt, this di a much better job.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Got one and on second day (hose attachment used only) of use started to flood my house so requested a replacement. Had to pay £23.40 which should be refunded to return broken one. Got replacement and half way through the sofa i was cleaning again hose attachment, hose stopped working not allowing spray and machine was hot to touch. When machine works it does a fantastic job according to personal opinion. Cons: very heavy, 2 broke when using hose attachments, can flood or completely stop working and over heat. Pros: hose does clean very well when working. Cant say nothing about the machine been used on carpets as broke before had chance to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, thorough job and leave a wonderful result every time.
customer_reviews.text: The vax carpet washer has been a god send. Pup now 11 months but for the first 4 months he pee’d on one area of the carpet all the time. About to get a new carpet but thought we would give this a shot. It took two passes but has brought the light grey carpet back to near new condition and the whole room smells fresher. Took next to no time to dry and we are about to do the whole house. Brilliant job and it gives the looks like it was done by an industrial cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Dual system excellent results in no time
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit heavier than I expected which is nota and thing. I have a german shepherd along with light coloured carpets, so I purchased the new vax cleaner as my last one was 10 years old I'm so happy with the results my carpets are like new. I would have no hesitation in recommending this cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Evaline

customer_reviews.title: Carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Good priced product, not to heavy and easy to use, hand held hose lacks a little in vacuum power but overall satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Alan Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Just moved into our house and brought this as the carpet was a bit dirty in parts, didn’t realise how dirty it was!! Did a great job. Really easy to use the carpet dose dry in about an hour but I did a rinse after so dose take longer to dry, but all in all well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: OK, for the 5 minutes it worked!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and the instructions nice and clear. The unit itself feels relatively sturdy, however in use is it quite heavy (and very noisy). The unit performed ‘OK’ for the 5 minutes of use I got out of it. The dirty tank uses a plastic float to stop the vacuum when its full. The problem is the unit i received pulls up the float straight away, turning off the suction, rendering it useless. I think I may have been unlucky given other reviews however. Amazon returns have not been very easy to deal with either....
customer_reviews.author: MORPHEUS24-7

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all! Good points carpets are dry as described- but I haven’t noticed a big difference to my carpets. Gutted as it was a lot of money
customer_reviews.author: Z's mummy

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great I was about to buy a new carpet but I decided to try with a carpet washing machine I saw that this model had good reviews and I bought it and the images speak for themselves, I just gave a little test wash and I loved the results I am like a child when you just received a new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Rose P. V.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant machine!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing machine!!!!! I used it at work ( I work in a pub, so you can imagine the carpet!!) It bought them up like new! I’m so impressed. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ML Charleston

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this product. It has done an amazing job on my living room carpet. It looks brand new now.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Chell

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: For regular cleaning this is the cleaner to go for. The machine cleans very well, the suction isn’t amazing but it does collect most of it, claims dry in 45 but that is ambitious claim for any cleaner - definitely dry by next day tho. We used to get a professional cleaning company in once a year, this takes a little longer but I have been getting better results than a professional clean usually does, with only a little perseverance! It’s already paid for itself and we are happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy O.

customer_reviews.title: Gives carpets a deep clean and they look new
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shampoo machine, ashamed how much dirt came out of my carpets, it drys really quick and leaves carpets like brand new
customer_reviews.author: Jayne86

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Superb. Carpets are more than I expected them to be. Very pleased. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Peter carrigan

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended ,quick and easy to use , carpets dry fast enough even on deep clean mode
customer_reviews.text: Bought from Amazon but cancelled my order and bought it from Argos because Amazon sucks at delivery ! Very good carpet cleaner ,does what it says in the advert . Good value for money and a great alternative to renting a Rug Doctor as you can use this whenever you want to and also clean your car upholstery .
customer_reviews.author: Cerasine

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Cleans brilliantly, my carpet is very short and flat, I was worried that might be a problem and none of the reviews gave me any reassurance with that. But its just excellent, the front of the machine was pressed on the carpet at all times and although it is loud it makes up for it in every other aspect. My carpets where dry in under 30 mins, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sass

customer_reviews.title: Works a treat
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a result! My landing carpet was really dirty, I was actually skeptical about it removing the dirt but it bought my carpet up as new, not a bad price too, highly recommended. Well done Vax!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Good machine.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, but when it's full of water etc on the stairs it can be quite heavy, but apart from that, it is really good and leaves carpets like new.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: A must purchase
customer_reviews.text: After we had a disaster with our dogs, we needed something that was going to beat touch stains and smells. This is the one! It is a little bigger than I thought it would be but it works instantly is stored under the stairs. Easy enough to use every month or so.
customer_reviews.author: mrs K.

customer_reviews.title: I prefer Amazon amazon the best
customer_reviews.text: Since I’ve bought this carpet washer for the first time it was the best carpet washer I’ve ever had if I need a carpet washer in the future I would pay more for a better carpet washer
customer_reviews.author: Steven Gillibrand

customer_reviews.title: Overall very very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love it, cleans carpets, very happy. If I was being picky, when you need to clean the brushes. They are quite hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Davisgloucestershire

customer_reviews.title: It left my carpet looking like new
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with the vax I was going to replace my carpet but after using the vax carpet cleaner it looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: C. Platt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used only on main floors and has been amazing. Cleans fantastically, and leaves carpet almost dry. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: We are pleased we bought it
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with this cleaner.It made our carpets look like new and bearing in mind we have two dog's
customer_reviews.author: Steveo

customer_reviews.title: That your carpets have a new lease of life
customer_reviews.text: Everywhere were carpet was, really impressed with outcome, when you can see dirt etc filtering through
customer_reviews.author: Angela frodsham

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic didn't fulfill me with confidence ... So I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Mr JD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, really powerful piece of kit, brought a 15 year old carpet up like new,
customer_reviews.author: john mook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent though heavy
customer_reviews.text: Machine excellent although a little heavy but really cleans well
customer_reviews.author: mark walker

customer_reviews.title: Wow, new and improved
customer_reviews.text: Wow, new and improved! Really easy to use, amazing results and the carpet dries so quickly
customer_reviews.author: C Shelford

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does the job really well. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good product but stopped working same day of arrival
customer_reviews.text: The product was good but it stopped working the same day it arrived. The power button is temperamental and dosent stay switched on once it is pressed. I give 2 stars solely because of the manufacturing fault otherwise it is a good product. I have ordered a replacement and will update this review with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: 4,5 star to be honest
customer_reviews.text: Machine is rly doing its job, carpet is drying fast, and how much dirt it collects is just terrifing. The only problem is size of the cap to fill it with water and solution. If U are not filling directly from the tap its rly hard to not split something around.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Easy to use .carpets are dry in about an hour .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic my 3piece looks new, everyone has been amazed at results even the OH was impressed
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D

customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use the difference its made to what I thought were clean carpets is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: do not believe the parts included .
customer_reviews.text: got the vax for carpet and the spinner for the stairs. used the carpet part ready for stairs no spinner in the kit looked in the book not supplied with my model even though the video showed it . would of sent vax back if seen before use .
customer_reviews.author: brian deighton

customer_reviews.title: CARPET SHAMPOOER
customer_reviews.text: very easy to put together but is heavy to lift upstairs but managed/ carpets look so much cleaner and did not take too long to clean would recommend this machine
customer_reviews.author: sandyb

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Only used once but cleaned carpets on a quick wash and not left too wet.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent results after one cleaning session. Equally as good as the cleaner we had previously hired. Very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy to use, substantial machine which is not overly heavy and does what it says it's going to do, well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: desy12

customer_reviews.title: Deep clean
customer_reviews.text: It is the greatest carpet shampooer I have had easy to use great suction get your carpet clean on both washers the deep clean get right down
customer_reviews.author: joanwilliamson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Really good product easy to use and assemble really well suction and brilliant to clean all areas of carpet definitely recommend this carpet cleaner to anyone who struggles cleaning carpets good price
customer_reviews.author: liam leach

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. My well trodden living room looks brilliant after using my vax
customer_reviews.author: katrina anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic service
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic piece of kit cleans the carpets amazingly very easy to use and not to loud delivery was very fast fantastic service
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy any other cleaner this is the best.
customer_reviews.text: The whole package is better than anyother carpet washer I have had.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth.beaumont

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Hose isn’t long enough so makes it awkward on placing the whole machine & it’s quite heavy but overall a great cleaner
customer_reviews.author: cari evs

customer_reviews.title: Not grwat as what i expecetd
customer_reviews.text: no great as what i thougt。 after first i used doesnt clean as what i expected. And relly inconvientto clean stairs.
customer_reviews.author: bluesky

customer_reviews.title: That it works as it states on the net and it does
customer_reviews.text: To wash my bed room carpet and it is like new again the only problem with the machine is that it is very heavy I would bye it again
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: My little helper!!!)))
customer_reviews.text: I just love it!!! It's almost 1 year with me and helps me to keep my carpets fresh clean.
customer_reviews.author: Albina

customer_reviews.title: You must clean the brush heads after as you go can get cloged
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use I did all my carpets and stairs in no time. It was amazing .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality with a young one I love clean carpets when he is crawling amazing
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: it does what it is intended to do used it and no complaints very good so far.
customer_reviews.author: James Gordon

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned the carpet and upholstery very well. Not too wet.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Made a super job of cleaning my carpets could not believe how much dirt came out!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D J Smit

customer_reviews.title: that it does the job
customer_reviews.text: my son got it for his carpets does a good job very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: b gray

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use as a carpet cleaner not to hard to follow the instructions to the letter
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Bissel, this one is easier to use and more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant machine
customer_reviews.text: Shampooing carpets all round the house. Also used in our motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: michael trueman

customer_reviews.title: Wow I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it not to heavy to push does every thing it says
customer_reviews.author: Marie harte

customer_reviews.title: A definite improvement on previous model
customer_reviews.text: Easier to use and more action is more visible than previous model
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet ckeaner
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to assemble and use and cleaned my carpet really well. Took longer to dry than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Powell

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Can be used any time.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, and the quick wash does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Sue train

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning for Carpets
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easily adaptable for use on the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, our carpet is like a new again.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Molnar

customer_reviews.title: Worked brilliantly
customer_reviews.text: Bought to save money on professional cleaning. Used once so far and it worked brilliantly. Used the Deep Clean feature and was a bit worried about how long it would take to dry. However, on a nice dry sunny day it only took 2 hours and it was completely dry and able to replace furniture. Must get more cleaning detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, disappointing on the stairs...
customer_reviews.text: I decided on this model as it had the attachments for stairs. The hose is not long enough to do the whole flight from the bottom, and if you’re safety conscious like me...! I didn’t think it worked too well on the stairs, so disappointed there. Sucked up satisfyingly disgusting water, fluff and dust from the carpets so happy!! You only get a very small bottle of solution with the cleaner which didn’t last long. Waiting for a delivery of non-vax solution to try with it as vax solution is very expensive and no smell. It has done the job.....
customer_reviews.author: KMG

customer_reviews.title: It does a good job on even heavily soiled carpets.
customer_reviews.text: Once l started using my vax rapid power,l must admit l felt nervous and it didn't come naturally to me however l persevered and my confidence grew.what a great machine the results were great,and l can recommend this product, it has saved us the cost of purchasing New carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa T.

customer_reviews.title: Very clean carpet
customer_reviews.text: My carpet was in a need for a deep clean as it's cream, I got high quotes for professional cleaning so I thought I'd buy this instead and I'm glad I did, it really cleaned my carpet well, you could actually see how dirty the water was after I was amazed. Glad I chose this, only down side is when tank is full of water it's quite heavy, but good excuse for the husband to clean it for me 😊
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: Amazing you need it!
customer_reviews.text: Brought as we were tired of paying for someone to come and clean our carpets all the time. It’s easy to put together it’s simple to use slightly noisy but not an issue at all and the results are amazing. Our carpets look like new. It’s a new addiction watching how clean it makes your carpets come up. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Just ok but sofa accessory doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This is ok for carpets but the upholstery attachment just didn’t work. There am I building myself up to clean the sofa and no water or solution came out. Felt a bit of a plonker, so checked everything and asked the guru (lovely wife) to have a look. Still nothing 😥😷 will take it up with Vax......
customer_reviews.author: ethicalsupply

customer_reviews.title: Best Carpet Cleaner Ever
customer_reviews.text: Item was easy to assemble. Easy to fill compartments for fresh water, solution and quick removal of dirty water. Item is sturdily built and has certainly done a good job on my carpets. Not as heavy as I thought it would be and it is best to move without any water in the containers! Highly recommended without any hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: 1ALPHADELTA

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this carpet washer it's the best so far out of all the vax I've had . As you can see by my picture how much dirt it has lifted off my carpets . One down side is that it is a little heavy but other than that brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a brilliant product, I’m so happy, it cleans up after the gardeners, hikers and a muddy spaniel puppies in my house. Easy to use clean and store. Couldn’t ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Little gee

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great wee machine
customer_reviews.text: Have taken great delight in cleaning whole house [hard floors included]. All the dog hair gets left on the floor in little tight fur balls. [who knew there was so much]. All the house now on a qtrly schedule to be shampooed.
customer_reviews.author: uncanny_ability

customer_reviews.title: High Expectations. Exceeded!
customer_reviews.text: I have other Vax products in the house already (upright and cylinder vacs) so expect good quality products. This carpet cleaner exceeded those expectations by far. Cleans as well as a commercial cleaner and expect it to last many years. Can't fault it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken P

customer_reviews.title: good sucker
customer_reviews.text: goes like a bird- a bit noisy but up to the job. could not get the registration completed had to phone the help line who did it for me. the handle seems a little flimsy but should last if we are careful.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased customer
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased I made the right decision in buying this cleaner has got my carpets like new again would recommend this carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.author: amanda blaylock

customer_reviews.title: Good for small areas / rooms
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for occasional cleaning of small areas and it is fine for this. Reasonable for the price. If you plan to do bigger rooms and heavy duty it might struggle.
customer_reviews.author: El Tel

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: very easy to assemble just two screws for the handle job done ,just remember to dilute the cleaning fluid before using,I did not and it generates to much foam, It is very easy to clean just takes five minuets.
customer_reviews.author: Wack

customer_reviews.title: a really good buy
customer_reviews.text: does the job extremely well the carpets are now looking great again
customer_reviews.author: dodger

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the adverts
customer_reviews.text: My carpet was really dirty I kept looking at all the marks on it and the trail where we walk in the room. We used the vax and what a difference. It looks like a new carpet. Good value for money. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Pozzetti

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: A great machine. A little heavy to use but does a good job on all surfaces cleaned. Great suction. Quick drying. Easy to assemble. For everything I've cleaned estimate the machine has easily covered it's cost
customer_reviews.author: Maz

customer_reviews.title: Deep clean most carpets
customer_reviews.text: Its great to use and simple to operate. My only minor issue is I'd rather the cable came out at top of the handle and not at the base as its easy to tread on. A minor point really. It really gets so much dirt out of the carpets. Not used on stairs yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this vax. It did what it said it did...deep cleaned carpets, removed stains and brought carpets back like new, even husband noticed the difference!!!
customer_reviews.author: s. mum

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was brilliant cleaning carpets that had seen better times! Best cleaning system for the money
customer_reviews.author: Diane Richmond

customer_reviews.title: The best yet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best carpet cleaner I have owned and excellent at the price.
customer_reviews.author: RMB

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The name vax says it all an excellent machine gets carpets really clean
customer_reviews.author: sotonsu

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use , cleaned a very grubby mat very well. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lucybod

customer_reviews.title: Good value carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Good value carpet cleaner. Easy to set up and use. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: David A

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it does exactly what it says on the box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but not problem free!
customer_reviews.text: Have had some issues with machine leaking excess fluid onto the carpet. Quite heavy too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
